data_status.description: The status of the data being fetched, such as 'success' or 'error'.

date.description: The date corresponding to the analytics data.

metrics.description: Various metrics related to user account analytics.

ENGAGEMENT.description: The level of user interaction or engagement with content.

CLICKTHROUGH_RATE.description: The rate at which users clicked through to view content.

CLICKTHROUGH.description: The number of times users clicked through to view content.

CLOSEUP.description: The number of close-up views of content.

CLOSEUP_RATE.description: The rate at which close-up views of content occurred.

ENGAGEMENT_RATE.description: The rate at which user engagement with content occurred.

SAVE.description: The number of times users saved or pinned content.

SAVE_RATE.description: The rate at which content was saved or pinned by users.

IMPRESSION.description: The number of times content was displayed or viewed.
